Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the office of chief executive officer of the Roosevelt Island operating corporation
Summary: Relates to the office of chief executive officer of the Roosevelt Island operating corporation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 899 of the laws of 1984, relating to the creation of a public benefit corporation to plan, develop, operate, maintain and manage Roosevelt Island, in relation to the office of chief executive officer of the Roosevelt Island operating corporation
